snippet: Amanda Kessel scored the winner early in the third period and the United States beat Canada, 3-2, in the gold medal game of the women’s world hockey championship in Ottawa.
abstract: United States beats Canada, 3-2, to win women’s world hockey championship.
lead_paragraph: Amanda Kessel scored the winner early in the third period and the United States beat Canada, 3-2, in the gold medal game of the women’s world hockey championship in Ottawa.
